code: import{apiService}from'./api';class CartService{async getCart(){return await apiService.getCart();}async addToCart(productId,quantity){return await apiService.addToCart(productId,quantity);}async updateCartItem(itemId,quantity){return await apiService.updateCartItem(itemId,quantity);}async removeFromCart(itemId){return await apiService.removeFromCart(itemId);}async clearCart(){return await apiService.clearCart();}async getCartSummary(){return await apiService.getCartSummary();}}export const cartService=new CartService();
